column5: Biggest McBow of the season so far for me, smashed the bottom bounced bow skein and almost took my rod in with him! Close quarters battle with a big (for me) bow, cant beat it!
Id say that's a good bow for anyone, congrats!
It was an Erie trib.  There's only four around me that are open, and this one is the slowest and most pressured, so I won't name it.. but it's not hard to figure out.
Nice fish Rich.Grats  Just getting ready to head out for some "blast &cast". Weathers been stable,so Im thinking the bite should be good.
Close quarter steelhead are fun, when theres wood to contend with, nice fish
Way to go Rich, Congrats  , Tell me, you used a spinning reel to catch that fish, not one of those CLOTHE- line- reel thingies to reel her in.  OK Steelers, I'll go and stick my head

Well yes Fish Farmer , I float fished for 4 hours with that fancy pin I got, not a bite. The spinning gear never lets me down!  But catching that fish on my pin would have been 10x the experience, just sayin
They even cut the grass for you there Rich!   That's pretty sweet     Nice buck.
Come to the dark side Dave.LOL   Oh yee of little faith.LOL
